    public class WebFinger
extends org.restlet.Application

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebFinger

        public WebFinger()
        Constructs a new WebFinger.
        Sets the default media type to MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON and sets the status service to OAuth2StatusService.
